remarks: A subring of the base ring induces a subring of polynomials. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.)
statement:
subrgmpl.s $e |- S = ( I mPoly R ) $.
subrgmpl.h $e |- H = ( R |`s T ) $.
subrgmpl.u $e |- U = ( I mPoly H ) $.
subrgmpl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` U ) $.
subrgmpl $p |- ( ( I e. V /\ T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) -> B e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) $.
